document.full_text: dish network corp won blockbuster inc in a bankruptcy auction for $320 million, further broadening its business beyond satellite tv and setting up a possible showdown with netflix.
document.title: dish expands its scope with blockbuster win
lines_and_colors: dish network corp won blockbuster inc in a bankruptcy auction for $320 million, further broadening its business beyond satellite tv and setting up a possible showdown with netflix.
